Class Gold

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.entity.Item
      • gameworld.entity.Gold
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, InteractableEntity, java.io.Serializable

    public class Gold
extends Item
    Gold is used to represent the players score. The more gold a player has the higher the score

    Jasen
